content:
I'm currently studying Computer Science at UNIVALI in Brazil


My main programming languages since then are C++ and Python, both of them mostly learned in the university, but I also have some basic knowledge about Node.js and Lua from previous interactions with these languages on personal projects.

Currently I'm learning how to create websites using HTML, CSS and Javascript, this page will be used to test some of the things I've learned throughout the course from Rocketseat
If you're interested, you can check the page's source code in my github below.
